projectGridLines.title: Title: Building Autonomous AI Agents for Enterprise CRM Revolution
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Lead the development of cutting-edge AI agents that autonomously interact with Salesforce, transforming how businesses handle customer relationships. You'll be at the forefront of integrating Large Language Models with enterprise systems, building RAG-powered knowledge retrieval systems, and creating natural language interfaces that translate user requests into Salesforce actions. This is a unique opportunity to shape the future of AI-powered enterprise software while working directly with the engineering leadership in a fast-paced startup environment.


Skill sets: 

  • Python/JavaScript programming
  • Experience with modern AI/ML frameworks (PyTorch, Transformers, LangChain)
  • Basic understanding of REST APIs
  • Familiarity with vector databases
  • Knowledge of software development best practices
  • Basic understanding of CRM systems (Salesforce knowledge is a plus)


Traits expectation: 

  • Strong problem-solving abilities and analytical thinking
  • Enthusiastic about AI/ML and its real-world applications
  • Self-motivated learner with ability to quickly grasp new technologies
  • Good communication skills for collaborating with team members
  • Passion for innovation and experimentation
  • Ability to work independently while contributing to team goals


Expected learning: 

  • Hands-on experience with state-of-the-art LLMs and AI agents
  • Deep understanding of RAG architectures and vector databases
  • Practical experience in enterprise AI system design
  • Salesforce platform architecture and development
  • AI product development lifecycle in a startup environment
  • Best practices in testing and deploying AI systems
  • Real-world application of natural language processing
  • Experience in building production-grade AI solutions


Specific courses required for project execution:  

  • Machine Learning
  • Artificial Intelligence
  • Database Management Systems
  • Object-Oriented Programming
  • Software Engineering
  • Natural Language Processing
  • Cloud Computing
